DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate metabolic effect acute inflammation without nutritional supplement amino acid . E. Coli Endotoxin ( LPS , lipopolysaccharide ) use initiate inflammatory response . The study interventional randomize placebo study include 8 healthy male subject . Each subject participate 3 time ( different day ) give one follow intervention : - Placebo ( NaCl ) - Endotoxin , US standard reference E.Coli + Placebo ( NaCl ) - Endotoxin , US standard reference E.Coli + Amino acid ( intravenously ) It hypothesis nutritional intervention acute inflammation play important role lipid protein metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Amino Acid Supplement During Acute Inflammation .
DOC.criteria: male gender 20 < BMI < 30 Age > 25 year old Written consent start study Allergy soya product ore egg Diabetes Epilepsy Infection Immune defect Heart disease Dysregulated hypertension Participating trial use radioactive tracer xrays last year .
